description: /spot/v4/batch-order
---

## 接口

**DELETE** `/spot/v4/batch-order`

Note: The parameters should be placed in the request body in the form of json

## 请求参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `clientBatchId` | string | 否 |  | client batch id |  |
| `orderIds` | array | 是 |  | `6216559590087220004, <br> 6216559590087220005` |  |

## 示例请求

### Java

```java
public String batchOrderDel(){


}
```

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {}
}
```
